{"blocks":[{"key":"942qi","text":"•\tEppendorf DNA LoBind Tubes, 2.0 mL (022431048)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pao9","text":"•\tTips RT-LTS-A-1000µL-/L/S/W-768/8 (30389221)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s90a","text":"•\tFlowmi® Cell Strainers, 40 μm, for 1000 uL Pipette Tips (BAH136800040)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58gsa","text":"•\tSorvall™ ST 8 Small Benchtop Centrifuge (75007204 - refrigerated)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee3ou","text":"•\tThermo Scientific™ Adapters for TX-150 Swinging Bucket Rotors (75-005-743)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Reagents to Order for Lysis and Wash Buffers:
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"acvn3","text":"•\tUltraPure™ 1 M Tris-HCI Buffer, pH 7.5 (Invitrogen, 15567027)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"736tq","text":"•\tNaCl (5 M), RNase-free (Invitrogen, AM9759)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82vb6","text":"•\tMgCl2 (1 M) (Invitrogen, AM9530G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bt5k6","text":"•\tNonidet P40 Substitute (Sigma, 74385-1L)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1juc2","text":"•\tMACS BSA Stock Solution (Miltenyi Biotec, 130-091-376)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8s70","text":"•\tPhosphate Buffered Saline (1X) (Corning, 21-040-CM) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rk22","text":"•\tSUPERase• In™ RNase Inhibitor (20 U/μL) (Invitrogen, AM2696)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agk3t","text":"Stock Lysis buffer: Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ci7u","text":" Reagent Stock Final 2 mL Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) 1M 10 mM 20 mL NaCl 5M 10 mM 4 mL MgCl2 1M 3 mM 6 mL Nonidet P40 Substitute 10% 0.1% 3 mL Molecular Grade Water - 1.974 mL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":306}],"data":{}},{"key":"desu1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","5_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[106,104,104,105],"data":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 2 mL "],[" Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) "," 1M "," 10 mM "," 20 mL "],[" NaCl "," 5M "," 10 mM "," 4 mL "],[" MgCl2 "," 1M "," 3 mM "," 6 mL "],[" Nonidet P40 Substitute "," 10% "," 0.1% "," 3 mL "],[" Molecular Grade Water "," "," - "," 1.974 mL "]],"guid":"917EDC77322911EEAD800A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 2 mL "],[" Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) "," 1M "," 10 mM "," 20 mL "],[" NaCl "," 5M "," 10 mM "," 4 mL "],[" MgCl2 "," 1M "," 3 mM "," 6 mL "],[" Nonidet P40 Substitute "," 10% "," 0.1% "," 3 mL "],[" Molecular Grade Water "," "," - "," 1.974 mL "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aik8c","text":"•\tKeep everything on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80p2t","text":"•\tUse wide-bore pipette tips for all steps when possible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du09p","text":"•\tUse RNase free reagents and consumables (Use filtered tips). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2au3","text":"•\tFor centrifugation steps, use swinging rotor bucket at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d02q0","text":"Lysis Dilution Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39ira","text":" Reagent Stock Final 10 mL Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) 1M 10 mM 100 mL NaCl 5M 10 mM 20 mL MgCl2 1M 3 mM 30 mL Molecular Grade Water - 9.85 mL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":248}],"data":{}},{"key":"63iir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[106,104,104,105],"data":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) "," 1M "," 10 mM "," 100 mL "],[" NaCl "," 5M "," 10 mM "," 20 mL "],[" MgCl2 "," 1M "," 3 mM "," 30 mL "],[" Molecular Grade Water "," "," - "," 9.85 mL "]],"guid":"B4681368322911EEAD800A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) "," 1M "," 10 mM "," 100 mL "],[" NaCl "," 5M "," 10 mM "," 20 mL "],[" MgCl2 "," 1M "," 3 mM "," 30 mL "],[" Molecular Grade Water "," "," - "," 9.85 mL "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ignh","text":"0.1X Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qh7n","text":" Reagent Stock Final 10 mL 1X Lysis Buffer 1X 0.1X 1 mL Lysis Dilution Buffer 1X 0.9X 9 mL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":160}],"data":{}},{"key":"emb2c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[106,104,104,105],"data":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" 1X Lysis Buffer "," 1X "," 0.1X "," 1 mL "],[" Lysis Dilution Buffer "," 1X "," 0.9X "," 9 mL "]],"guid":"CBC5E936322911EEAD800A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" 1X Lysis Buffer "," 1X "," 0.1X "," 1 mL "],[" Lysis Dilution Buffer "," 1X "," 0.9X "," 9 mL "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l68u","text":"Wash buffer: 1X PBS + 2% BSA + 0.2U/ul RNase inhibitor ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f90r","text":" Reagent Stock Final 10 mL BSA 10% 2% 2 mL PBS 1X 1X 8 mL RNAse Inhibitor 20 U/mL 0.2U/ul 1 mL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":186}],"data":{}},{"key":"562cq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2te8s","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[106,104,104,105],"data":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" BSA "," 10% "," 2% "," 2 mL "],[" PBS "," 1X "," 1X "," 8 mL "],[" RNAse Inhibitor "," 20 U/mL "," 0.2U/ul "," 1 mL "]],"guid":"9365A6FE322A11EEAD800A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[[" Reagent "," Stock "," Final "," 10 mL "],[" BSA "," 10% "," 2% "," 2 mL "],[" PBS "," 1X "," 1X "," 8 mL "],[" RNAse Inhibitor "," 20 U/mL "," 0.2U/ul "," 1 mL "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6e94n","text":"sn-ATAC-Seq submission
buffer: 1X Nuclei Dilution Buffer. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k1uj","text":"We store aliquots of 20X
Nuclei Dilution Buffer at -20oC in aliquots of no more than 25ul/each
tube to minimize freeze/thaw. We make just enough fresh 1X Nuclei Dilution
Buffer each time we use it. Add 425 uL Nuclease Free Water.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at057","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparing sample for auto-MACS dead cell removal
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"boo13","text":"1.\tAdd 5 mL running buffer to tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6opgc","text":"2.\tThaw aliquot in 37⁰C water bath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e81pi","text":"3.\tSpray with 70% EtOH and wipe down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24qvr","text":"4.\tAdd 1 mL thaw media to each aliquot and transfer to running buffer tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsbne","text":"5.\tRemove supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hd9d","text":"6.\tRe-suspend each in 100 uL of beads and incubate at room temperature for 15 mins","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8jde","text":"7.\tDilute 0.25 mL of 20x binding buffer with 4.75 mL of distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"v9pn","text":"8.\tAdd 500 uL of 1x binding buffer to each tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3048r","text":"9.\tRun each through the DepleteS selection on the Automacs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n96c","text":"10.\tToss the positive fractions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e74or","text":"11.\tPull off 10 uL each from negative fractions to count","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eigmg","text":"12.\tProceed downstream with negative fractions, cells still suspended in buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Single Cell and Nucleus Prep for sc-RNA-Seq and sn-ATAC-Seq
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c6uas","text":"1.\tSpin down at 400 g for 5 min. Remove supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnm1e","text":"2.\tResuspend in 1000uL Wash Buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bbeo","text":"3.\tSpin down cells at 400 g for 5 min. Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8dd2","text":"4.\tRe-suspend in 200-1000 uL Wash buffer depending on size of the cell pellet with RNase Inhibitor. Count cells at this point – take 10uL of trypan blue and 10uL of sample and determine starting concentration of sample. If there is more than 1500 cells/uL then add more wash buffer and recount. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qcnp","text":"5.\tAliquot cell suspension to load approximately 10,000 cells/ul (refer to 10X 3’ NEXT GEM protocol, Figure 2). Set aside another 50-100 uL of cell suspension for back up. Centrifuge remaining sample at 400g for 8’ at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2f3g","text":"6.\tWhile remaining cell suspension is being spun down, load 10X CHIP G (single-cell). After loading chip you have 17 minutes to process remaining sample for sn-ATAC. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iq10","text":"7.\tAfter spin is finished, re-suspend cells in 500 L of cold lysis buffer. Pipette gently for 25 times (until pellet is fully resuspended). Incubate on ice for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e9gk","text":"8.\tAdd 400 uL Wash Buffer to same tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g5mh","text":"9.\tTransfer the clear lysis-wash buffer suspension using the 40um flowmi cell strainer into a 2.0 mL tube. Centrifuge sample at 400g for 5’ at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9r6r","text":"10.\tOnce the sample is finished spinning, remove as much supernatant as possible. The pellet should be at the very bottom of tube if using ST8 Centrifuge. Add 7-10uL 1X Nucleus Dilution Buffer (sn-ATAC-Seq submission buffer). Gently resuspend until nuclei are completely re-suspended. Count nuclei at this point – Add 8 uL 1X Nucleus Dilution Buffer to 2 uL of sample and 10 uL of trypan blue. If concentration of nuclei is greater than 3,000 nuclei/uL then proceed with ATAC prep. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ts5r","text":"11.\tContinue both 10X protocols accordingly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ivcp","text":"a.\tChromium Single Cell ATAC Reagent Kits User Guide (v1 Chemistry)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gb5e","text":"b.\tChromium Single Cell 3' Reagent Kits User Guide (v3.1 Chemistry)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
